ticket_text: I can’t log in to the mobile app even though my username and password are correct.
llm_actions_generated: Check recent login failures; confirm account not locked; guide agent to reset credentials and escalate to core_banking_it_support if needed.
expert_standard_actions: Verify login attempts in core system; check lock status; guide agent to reset credentials; escalate to IT support if authentication service is unstable.

ticket_text: I forgot my online banking password and the reset link is not working.
llm_actions_generated: Verify identity and trigger password reset; check if reset email/SMS was sent; escalate to digital_banking_support if the link continues to fail.
expert_standard_actions: Confirm customer identity; trigger secure password reset process; verify reset link logs; escalate to online banking support if link generation fails.

ticket_text: Face ID login keeps failing and asks me to enter password every time.
llm_actions_generated: Review biometric settings and device details; have customer re-enrol biometrics; escalate persistent failures to mobile_banking_support.
expert_standard_actions: Check device and biometric settings; advise disabling and re-enabling biometric login; verify failed attempts in logs; escalate to mobile app team if pattern persists.

ticket_text: The app logs me out after a few seconds and shows a session timeout message.
llm_actions_generated: Check session timeout and multiple logins; ask customer to update app; escalate abnormal timeouts to core_banking_it_support.
expert_standard_actions: Review session timeout configuration; check for multiple device logins; advise customer to update app; raise ticket to IT if abnormal session drops are noticed.

ticket_text: The banking app keeps crashing whenever I try to open my accounts.
llm_actions_generated: Capture error message and app version; recommend reinstalling the app; log a ticket with mobile_banking_support if crashes repeat.
expert_standard_actions: Collect error details and screenshots; check app version and OS; advise reinstalling app; log incident with mobile engineering if crashes are reproducible.

ticket_text: The ATM did not dispense any cash but my account has been debited.
llm_actions_generated: Confirm debit on core system and switch; raise ATM cash-not-dispensed dispute; request provisional credit; route to atm_pos_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Check ATM transaction reconciliation; verify cash dispense logs; place provisional credit as per policy; log dispute with ATM operations team.

ticket_text: The ATM near my office is out of service and swallowed my card receipt.
llm_actions_generated: Identify ATM and outage time; notify ATM operations; check any impacted transactions; propose alternative access channels to the customer.
expert_standard_actions: Identify ATM ID and outage history; notify ATM operations; check for impacted transactions; advise customer on alternative channels if card was retained.

ticket_text: I tried to withdraw cash but the transaction failed and I don’t know the status.
llm_actions_generated: Check switch logs for withdrawal status; confirm debit or reversal; explain standard reversal timelines; escalate unclear cases to atm_pos_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Check transaction status in switch logs; confirm debit or reversal; advise waiting period as per policy; escalate to ATM operations if status is unclear.

ticket_text: My wallet was stolen with my debit card inside, I need urgent help.
llm_actions_generated: Hotlist the card immediately; review recent transactions for fraud; raise fraud case; route to fraud_investigations and card_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Immediately block the card; review recent transactions for fraud; raise card hotlisting; route to fraud_investigations and card_operations for follow-up.

ticket_text: My card keeps getting declined in stores even though I have enough balance.
llm_actions_generated: Review decline reason, balance and limits; advise PIN retry or alternate channel; escalate recurring declines to card_authorizations.
expert_standard_actions: Verify available balance and card status; check decline codes; advise PIN retry or alternate channel; route to card_authorizations if repeated declines occur.

ticket_text: I see the same card transaction charged twice on my statement.
llm_actions_generated: Compare authorisation and clearing records; confirm double posting; raise duplicate charge dispute; route to card_disputes_chargebacks.
expert_standard_actions: Verify transaction timestamps; compare authorisation and clearing data; raise dispute for duplicate charge; route to card_disputes_chargebacks.

ticket_text: There are several card transactions on my account that I do not recognise.
llm_actions_generated: Block card and mark suspicious transactions; open fraud dispute; route to fraud_monitoring and card_disputes_chargebacks.
expert_standard_actions: Block the card; mark suspicious transactions; raise fraud dispute case; route simultaneously to fraud_monitoring and card_disputes_chargebacks.

ticket_text: I have been charged an annual fee on my credit card that I did not expect.
llm_actions_generated: Check card terms and last annual fee date; verify any waiver conditions; request fee reversal if appropriate; route to card_collections.
expert_standard_actions: Verify product terms for annual fees; check waiver eligibility; calculate pro-rated refund; route to card_collections or card_operations for adjustment.

ticket_text: I was charged a minimum balance fee even though I maintained sufficient funds.
llm_actions_generated: Check minimum balance rules; review recent balances; reverse misapplied fee; document the decision per fee policy.
expert_standard_actions: Review account balance history; confirm minimum balance thresholds; reverse fee if applied in error; document exception as per fee policy.

ticket_text: The interest charged on my loan this month seems higher than usual.
llm_actions_generated: Recompute interest for last cycle; compare with system value; correct misposting; route to retail_loans_servicing for systemic issues.
expert_standard_actions: Recalculate interest for the period; compare with system calculation; correct any misposting; route to retail_loans_servicing if systemic error is found.

ticket_text: My salary has not been credited this month although my employer says it was sent.
llm_actions_generated: Check salary credit queue and employer mandate; verify if payment is pending or returned; open a case with domestic_payments_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Check salary credit schedules and employer mandate; search incoming payments queue; open case with domestic_payments_operations if funds not located.

ticket_text: Only part of my salary appears in my account, the rest is missing.
llm_actions_generated: Confirm salary instruction and credited amount; check for partial returns; escalate discrepancy to payments operations; request payslip proof.
expert_standard_actions: Compare employer instruction and credited amount; check for partial returns; escalate to payments operations; advise agent to request payslip evidence.

ticket_text: My domestic transfer is still pending and the beneficiary has not received funds.
llm_actions_generated: Track domestic transfer in payments system; check beneficiary details; open a trace if delay exceeds SLA.
expert_standard_actions: Track transfer status in payments system; verify beneficiary details; confirm cut-off times; open trace with domestic_payments_operations if delayed.

ticket_text: My international payment has not reached the beneficiary after several days.
llm_actions_generated: Check SWIFT tracking and compliance/FX holds; initiate an international payment investigation with international_payments_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Verify SWIFT or cross-border payment status; check compliance or FX holds; initiate investigation with international_payments_operations.

ticket_text: An online bill payment failed but the amount is still blocked in my account.
llm_actions_generated: Check gateway and core logs; confirm if funds are debited or blocked; release hold or raise dispute; route to digital_banking_support if recurring.
expert_standard_actions: Check payment gateway logs; confirm whether funds are debited or blocked; release hold or raise dispute; route to digital_banking_support if recurring.

ticket_text: My card payment at a store failed but the money was debited.
llm_actions_generated: Verify POS logs and reversals; confirm whether customer was debited; raise a dispute for confirmed debit; coordinate with atm_pos_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Verify POS authorisation logs; check reversal entries; raise dispute for confirmed debits; coordinate with atm_pos_operations for merchant follow-up.

ticket_text: My UPI payment shows as processing for a long time and the merchant has not received money.
llm_actions_generated: Check UPI status; if pending beyond SLA start refund; route complex cases to digital_banking_support.
expert_standard_actions: Check UPI transaction status; confirm whether funds are in suspense; initiate auto-reversal or manual refund; route to digital_banking_support.

ticket_text: My loan EMI was debited twice this month from my account.
llm_actions_generated: Check EMI schedule and postings; confirm duplicate debit; reverse extra EMI; update loan account notes.
expert_standard_actions: Verify loan schedule and EMI postings; identify duplicate debit; reverse extra EMI as per policy; document adjustment in loan account notes.

ticket_text: My loan approval is taking too long and I have not received any update.
llm_actions_generated: Review loan application tracker; identify pending verifications; request expedited handling from retail_loans_servicing.
expert_standard_actions: Check application status and missing documents; confirm underwriting or verification queues; escalate to retail_loans_servicing for expedited review.

ticket_text: My fixed deposit matured but the payout has not been credited to my account.
llm_actions_generated: Verify FD maturity and instructions; confirm payout account; initiate manual payout if automation failed.
expert_standard_actions: Verify FD maturity date and instructions; check payout account details; trigger manual payout if automation failed; notify branch or FD operations.

ticket_text: The interest rate applied to my fixed deposit is lower than what was promised.
llm_actions_generated: Compare agreed FD rate with system; calculate interest shortfall; raise rate adjustment; inform product owners if recurring.
expert_standard_actions: Compare contracted rate with system rate; compute differential interest; raise adjustment request; log incident with product and IT teams.

ticket_text: I see unexpected overdraft fees on my current account this month.
llm_actions_generated: Review overdraft usage and fee rules; reverse incorrect charges; suggest limit review based on customer behaviour.
expert_standard_actions: Review overdraft terms and recent utilisation; validate fee triggers; reverse incorrect fees; suggest limit review if customer behaviour has changed.

ticket_text: My overdraft limit was reduced without any prior notification.
llm_actions_generated: Check overdraft limit history; identify risk-based changes; document reasons; escalate disputes to credit policy.
expert_standard_actions: Check current overdraft limit and last review; identify any risk-based limit changes; document rationale; escalate to credit policy if dispute persists.

ticket_text: I tried to update my contact details but the changes are not reflected.
llm_actions_generated: Verify submitted profile updates; check workflow logs; re-submit update if stuck; route to retail_account_operations.
expert_standard_actions: Verify current KYC and contact data; check workflow status; re-trigger profile update; route to retail_account_operations if manual intervention is needed.

ticket_text: I requested an account statement for the last six months and have not received it.
llm_actions_generated: Confirm requested statement period; regenerate and resend; verify delivery; escalate repeated failures to contact_center_general.
expert_standard_actions: Confirm period requested; generate or resend statement via system; verify email or channel delivery; route to contact_center_general if repeated failures occur.
